alert.note: Alert for Morongo Basin (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 21 at 8:48PM PDT until March 22 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Morongo Basin. * WHEN...Wind Advisory in effect until 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Take action to secure trash cans...lawn furniture...and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
